posts.message: To day is the last day :D , HURRY UP!!!
posts.caption: Global Game Jam - (ITI - Egypt Game Jam)
posts.description:
Duration:
23rd of Jan to 25th of Jan 2015

Who we are:
•	SD&G CoE aims to spread the technological awareness of the Electronic games development among the Egyptian youth.
•	We participated twice in the Global Game Jam Event to boost the game design and development spirit and uniting the gaming community.
•	The 2nd Annual Egypt Game Jam was held in January 2014. The number of attendees was 315 jammers, with 54 games. The jam was sponsored by (Microsoft, NOKIA, SAMSUNG, Construct2, V-Play and Stencil) who offered prizes varying from smart devices to software licenses. 
•	In the Egypt Game Jam 2013, there were more than 150 jammers with 28 games.


Why come to the Jam:
•	FREE Technical TRAINING in Game Development Technologies 
•	Meeting with the Gaming Business Leaders! 
•	A chance to meet and collaborate with the Egyptian Gaming Community

Join Us by registering : http://www.egyptgamejam.com on “ITI - Egypt Game jam”

هل في اقوي من ConfigServer في حماية السرفر من الملفات الخبيثة
http://www.configserver.com/cp/cxs.html
اصل بصراحة بعد ما اتركبت وبرده لسه رفع الملفات الخبيثة (php shells) شغال .. حتى لو الملفات مش مشفرة (كأن الاداة زي قلتها) بتمسك بعض الملفات الخبيثة فقط !!
انا عايز اداة قوية تحمي من رفع ملفات خبيثة (php shells) على السرفر 
السرفر  centos وعليه apache
ببساطة الاداة تتطلب اني اضيف signature الخاصة بكل ملف علشان يمسكه !!
Any of the AngularJs Geeks here can support :)
